name: IT 201 Sprint 1 (Talaar Rastguelenian)
description: Draw with 3D objects in a 3D plane. Left click to draw objects. Select the color of the object by moving the RGB sliders. Select the object type from the dropdown menu. Click on the 2D drawing object to draw in the XY plane. Click clear to erase everything on the screen. Click the time destroy button enable or disable times destroy.
